task.title: Mango Frozen Yogurt
task.shortdesc: A recipe for making mango frozen yogurt with the ice cream machine. This recipe will make about 6 cups, or 10-12 servings.

taskbody.context: You'll need these ingredients- 2 cups whole milk, plain Greek yogurt, Â½ cup granulated sugar, 4 cups frozen mango pieces (thawed) or fresh mango, 1 teaspoon fresh lime juice, pinch kosher salt.

step.cmd: Using a food processor, puree all of the ingredients until completely mixed
Scrape down the sides of the bowl as needed
Strain the mixture into a medium-sized bowl
Cover and place in the refrigerator

substep.cmd: Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight

step.cmd: Turn on the ice cream machine
Pour the mixture through the spout
Let the machine mix until thickened into a soft, creamy texture
If a firmer consistency is desired, follow step 4 from the previous recipe
